briefdescription.para: This populates the provided MLMovementSettings struct with all of the current system movement settings.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if input parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.

memberdef.argsstring: (in MLMovementSettings settings, in MLMovement3DofSettings dofSettings, in MLMovement3DofControls controls, in MLMovementObject obj, out ulong sessionHandle)
memberdef.name: Start3Dof

detaileddescription.para: A 3DoF movement session relies on the orientation of the user's pointing device, but ignores the position, when moving the target object.

parameterdescription.para: Settings to use for new movement session.
Handle to fill in for new movement session.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if input parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (in MLMovementSettings settings, in MLMovement6DofSettings dofSettings, in MLMovement6DofControls controls, in MLMovementObject obj, out ulong sessionHandle)
memberdef.name: Start6Dof

detaileddescription.para: A 6DoF movement session relies on both the position and orientation of the user's pointing device when moving the target object.

parameterdescription.para: Settings to use for new movement session.
Handle to fill in for new movement session.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if input parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Change the depth offset of the object from the user's headpose. (when using a 3DoF movement session) or from the pointing device (when using a 6DoF movement session).

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Change the rotation about the up-axis of the object being moved.

detaileddescription.para: This rotation applies to the object in its local space, and not to the rotation relative to the user's headpose (when using a 3DoF movement session) or relative to the pointing device (when using a 6DoF movement session).

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong sessionHandle, in MLMovement3DofControls controls, float deltaTime, ref MLMovementObject inOutObj)
memberdef.name: Update3Dof

detaileddescription.para: This function is intended to be called once per frame per active 3Dof movement session.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if input parameters were invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong sessionHandle, in MLMovement6DofControls controls, float deltaTime, ref MLMovementObject inOutObj)
memberdef.name: Update6Dof

detaileddescription.para: This function is intended to be called once per frame per active 6Dof movement session.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if input parameters were invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong sessionHandle, float deltaTime, out MLMovementObject obj)
memberdef.name: End

detaileddescription.para: This function is intended to be called once per frame per active movement session while it returns MLResult_Pending. This will allow the session to resolve any remaining soft collisions.

parameterdescription.para: Object to fill out with the final data.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Pending if the movement session is still resolving.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if the movement session was unable to resolve and was forcefully ended..
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if input parameters were invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong sessionHandle, in Vector3 contactNormal, out ulong collisionHandle)
memberdef.name: StartHardCollision

briefdescription.para: Start tracking a new hard collision for a movement session.

detaileddescription.para: Call this to inform the movement library that the moving object has collided with something impenetrable. The movement library will not allow the moving object to penetrate the other object in the direction opposite the contact normal. You can update the contact normal for the returned collision instance handle each frame by calling MLMovementUpdateHardCollision. This is useful if the moving object is colliding with a curved surface so the contact normal is changing as the moving object slides against the collision surface.

parameterdescription.para: Normalized Vector3 surface normal of object that movement is colliding with.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if contactNormal was invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidCollisionHandle if collision handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong sessionHandle, in Vector3 otherPosition, float closestDistance, float maxDistance, out ulong collisionHandle)
memberdef.name: StartSoftCollision

briefdescription.para: Start tracking a new soft collision for a movement session.

detaileddescription.para: Soft collisions will allow a degree of interpenetration during movement. Collisions will resolve over time giving the colliding objects a softness to them.

parameterdescription.para: Position of the center of the thing we are soft-colliding with, the source of the repulsion force.
The position of the the object being moved will never be closer to other_position than this distance.
The moving object will not be affected by this soft collision once its position is this distance from other_position.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if otherPosition was invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidCollisionHandle if collision handle is invalid.

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong sessionHandle, ulong collisionHandle, in Vector3 contactNormal)
memberdef.name: UpdateHardCollision

briefdescription.para: Update the collision normal for an existing hard collision session in an existing movement session.

detaileddescription.para: This function is intended to be called once per hard collision per movement session per frame.

parameterdescription.para: Normalized Vector3 surface normal of object that movement is colliding with.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if contactNormal was invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidCollisionHandle if collision handle is invalid.

briefdescription.para: End the tracking of a soft or hard collision session for a movement session.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidMovementHandle if session handle is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MovementInvalidCollisionHandle if collision handle is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Gets a readable version of the result code as an ASCII string.

parameterdescription.para: The MLResult that should be converted.

simplesect.para: ASCII string containing a readable version of the result code.

briefdescription.para: MLMovement class is the entry point for the Movement API
